revenueStreams.label: Print of Original Design
revenueStreams.description: Posters, zines, and canon postcards built for the Domestic Product storyworld.

revenueStreams.label: Print of Archive Materials
revenueStreams.description: Patent scans, reproduction menko, and protocol folders sourced from the archive bench.

revenueStreams.label: Luxury Flea Market
revenueStreams.description: Oddities, authentic pulls, pachinko tokens, and care goods that make the floor feel alive.

items.name: Imperial Sun Postcard — Red

items.name: Imperial Sun Postcard Trio
items.tagline: Highest attach-rate; the souvenir that always leaves with guests.

items.name: Original Poster — Lantern Protocol
items.tagline: Training manual print; anchors the instruction-wall bundle.

items.name: Zine: Domestic Product Field Notes

items.name: Mystery Protocol Folder

items.name: Thinking? Cap
items.tagline: Uniform vibe; the front-of-house statement piece.

items.name: How Much Do You Cost? Hat

items.name: Authentic Menko Mini-Pack (3)

items.name: Vintage Pogs Mixed Pack (12)

items.name: Museum Gloves (Pair)

items.name: Imperial Sun Enamel Pin

items.tagline: Merrowed edge patch for jackets, totes, or boiler suits.

items.name: Pachinko Token Set

bundles.name: Lantern Initiate Kit
bundles.tagline: Fast onboarding bundle; built for first-timers.

bundles.name: Full Station Protocol Bundle

bundles.name: Collector Archive Pack
bundles.tagline: For deep divers who want canon + play.

bundles.name: Barter Post Recovery Kit

activities.name: Identity Access Console
activities.notes: Signals assigned (Here, Now, Responder, Observer, Lantern) set tone for the run.

activities.name: Pachinko Machine
activities.notes: Token-fed reveal of rarity odds; can trigger barter-only pulls.

activities.name: Barter Post — Take 1 / Leave 2
activities.notes: Lantern-guided exchanges of pogs, menko, and micro-objects; receipts become lore.

activities.name: Sculpture Generator
activities.notes: Personality quiz yields a unique 3D form + badge; pieces can be sold into the Grift Shop churn.

activities.name: IRL Grift Shop
activities.notes: Webshop overlay mirrors IRL offers; blends print and luxury flea streams.

perks: Timed admission during the four-day run
Identity Access Console classification + Pachinko pull
Access to archive floor and Lantern wayfinding
Lantern-led Barter Post ritual + Barter credit
Sculpture Generator badge + Grift Shop proof
Press kit handoff and priority barter lane
